name: radix-framework
description: The Root Studio modern framework based on Flexbox
author: James Wigger <james@rootstudio.co.uk>

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run compile-sass && npm run compile-sass-min && npm run autoprefix && npm run autoprefix-min
scripts.compile-sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --output css/ radix.scss --outFile css/radix.css
scripts.compile-sass-min: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --output css/ radix.scss css/radix.min.css
scripts.pre-push: npm run build && npm run docs
